TopicTitle: Some models won't scale. Why is this so and can I make them?

Articles.Content:
I like to use @MODEL[foo]{ @ scale = 1,2,1} to stretch parts. On some, this doesn't work; I can only use rescaleFactor which maintains proportions.

Why is this so, and can I do something about it using ModuleManager?

16 hours ago, Laie said:

I like to use @MODEL[foo]{ @ scale = 1,2,1} to stretch parts. On some, this doesn't work; I can only use rescaleFactor which maintains proportions.

Why is this so, and can I do something about it using ModuleManager?

It has been like that for along time scale = *,*,* should be what the part was modeled has and rescaleFactor = *,*,* should be what you want it to be if it don't have rescaleFactor = you add by MM or edit the cfg

 

EDIT- And just seen you have @model when it should be at (   @PART[foo] { %scale = 1, 2, 1 %rescaleFactor = *, *, *   ) do make you have your spaces in there also just like squad

Edited August 21, 2018 by Mecripp
